snippet: Ten men, who have nicknames that seem more at home at a cartoon theme park, are accused of belonging to La Mara Salvatrucha, an international crime enterprise.
abstract: Indictment unsealed in federal court in Brooklyn charging 10 suspected members of La Mara Salvatrucha street gang, or MS-13, reveals new era of nicknames in the world of organized crime as the influence of the mob wanes and international street gangs rise in prominence.
lead_paragraph: Ten men, who have nicknames that seem more at home at a cartoon theme park, are accused of belonging to La Mara Salvatrucha, an international crime enterprise.

headline.seo: Ten Suspected Members of Feared Gang Indicted
